Description:
Senior Software Engineer
80 - 100 % per 01.05.2023
DaSCH, the Swiss National Data & Service Centre for the Humanities, is a national research infrastructure and long-term archive (repository) funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation and hosted at the University of Basel. We are responsible for archiving research data coming from research projects from all humanities disciplines like archaeology, history, art history, philosophy and/or history of science. We are a dynamic team with a broad knowledge and working with the most modern technologies. All software created at DaSCH is open source. We actively participate in the open source community. As a Senior Software Engineer you will join a very talented team of individuals who have learned to work well together. You are passionate and self-motivated, with enthusiasm about the complete software development cycle from inception of ideas through execution and delivery, willing to participate in the usual software engineering activities and work closely with other engineers, product management, and the rest of the team. You are open to new ideas and challenges and prefer to work incrementally, with attention to detail and delivery. You champion teamwork and respect majority decisions. We use Scala for the backend of our DaSCH Service Platform, Angular in the frontend, and Python for tooling. We build applications for the web (Desktop and Mobile). Our infrastructure is currently defined in Ansible; we are experimenting with other ways for orchestrating our services and moving towards the cloud. We have an automated test suite, and we are applying continuous integration (CI) and continuous delivery (CD) practices. All our software is open source and on Github (https://github.com/dasch-swiss).

* Werde Teil unseres Investment Controlling Teams - und damit von einer Abteilung im Wandel. * Unterstütze uns mit deinen konzeptionellen Kenntnissen im Bereich Data Warehousing und Datenmodellierung. * Nutze die Chance, die Veränderungen bei uns aktiv mitgestalten zu können.

Aktuell befinden wir uns im Bereich Asset Management in einer agilen Transformation hin zu noch mehr Selbstorganisation und somit mehr Eigenverantwortung. Description:
Beschreibung
Bei der digitalen Transformation übernimmst du Verantwortung im Management von qualitätsrelevanten Prozess- und Prüfdaten. In einem hoch motivierten und gut vernetzten Team entwickelst du die bestehenden Datenbanken und Dienste weiter. Zudem pflegst du diese permanent und bringst sie technologisch und qualitativ auf Spitzenniveau. Als belastbarer Stakeholder stellst du die Datenqualität im eigenen Bereich sicher, monitorst diese aktiv und leitest bei Bedarf frühzeitig Massnahmen ein. Zusammen mit den internen Stakeholdern aus Produktion, Engineering und Qualität identifizierst du in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen weitere Potenziale für die Datennutzung und setzt diese um.
Motivation
Wenn du dir vorstellen kannst, Teammitglied in einem innovativen und wachstumsstarken Hightech-Unternehmen in einem internationalen Umfeld zu werden, sollten wir uns kennenlernen.

Join Joe Security to Deeply Analyze Cyber Threats
Joe Security LLC is a fast-growing Swiss based company specialized in the development of automated malware analysis systems. We develop and support Joe Sandbox - one of the most advanced malware analysis system for Windows, Linux, Android, iOS and macOS operating systems. Joe Sandbox is actively being used by CERTs, CIRTs, AVs and firewall vendors around the world.
We are looking for a motivated Data Scientist with a high interest in malware analysis. Besides working closely with our team, the main task will be the development of new machine learning models to extract knowledge and insights from our malware analysis corpus.

Description:
The Position
At Roche Pharmaceutical Research and Early Development Organization (pRED), we believe that rapid advances in science and technology are our greatest opportunity to rethink how we address some of the world's most challenging unmet health needs and have an even more profound impact on patients and society.
The Roche Institute of Translational Bioengineering (ITB, http://ritb.roche.com) and the Immunology and Ophthalmology (I2O) Discovery Translation Area (DTA) within pRED are looking for an independent and highly motivated Postdoctoral Fellow, Retinal Organoid Bioengineering (m/f/d) to join our team at the interface of basic academic and translational research in the areas of organoid technology, microphysiological systems and age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
The Postdoctoral Fellow will play a key role in ITB's efforts to develop and apply next-generation human models that preserve important functional features of the human eye to be used to develop precision therapies.

Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' tracking data – you ensure our tailor-made IIOT-based systems are implemented to perfection so that they can collect the needed data.

At the heart of our track and trace platform are different IIOT devices and applications, which monitor our customers' assets and send these data further to our server product and customer's business application for analysis.

You will join our Central-European operations team in Switzerland, where we support some of our most long-term key customers and implement our systems to brand new industrial customers. Our office is in Gossau, but you can expect to travel roughly 50% of your time.

As our System Engineer you will be vital in implementing our track & trace solutions. You will mainly specify, test, commission, and support our customer systems.

BakerHicks realisiert mit Stolz und Leidenschaft preisgekrönte, effiziente und nachhaltige Projekte mit unseren Kunden aus der biotechnologischen, pharmazeutischen und chemischen Industrie. Job_title: Graduate Talent Program 2023, UBS RiskLab Data Science Model Services
Description:
Your role
Are you an enthusiastic computer science graduate looking to jump start your career in IT and data science? Do you have excellent problem-solving skills to solve advanced IT problems for our market leading data science model development platform? If so, you are the right person for this role. We're seeking graduate talents to join our development team within UBS Risk IT Model Services. We're looking for someone like that to:
work on the IT implementation of the new Cloud based data science model development platform for UBS Global Risk methodology team
develop in house web based application that automate the data science model development to production lifecycle
contribute to DevOps processes and setup the optimal data science development environments, containers, library dependencies, IDEs and execution pipelines.


Our Graduate Talent Program (GTP) lasts 18 months. You'll be directly involved in day-to-day operations, working with professionals and gaining first-hand experience of our business.

As well as on-the-job learning, you'll get training on the financial markets, our products and other core business topics. Rotational assignments are a key part of the program. By taking on other roles in related departments, you'll gain a wider perspective.

Besides all that, you'll attend networking events, cross-business classes and social occasions where you'll get to know us.

To learn more about our Graduate Talent Programs, click here .
You will be part of the UBS Risk IT, RiskLab and Model Services team.

The RiskLab Model Service team is a group of advanced and pioneering software engineers and data science professionals who brings modern computer science and data science technology and IT platform to our methodology data scientists.

We implement common reusable IT solutions to ensure the data science model development and execution runs on most optimal and scalable framework. We research emerging data science technology and draw up adaptation plan for our methodology audience, and setup regular training sessions or pilot model development to ensure the UBS Risk methodology remains competitive and ahead of our peers.


You need have completed your bachelor's or master's degree.

In particular, you have:

Perhaps you've organized a fundraising event or taken part in team sports? Or persevered and passed an exam in a subject you found challenging? Think about how things you've achieved match the skills we're after.

Start date: September 2023


At UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.

From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we're more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?


UBS is the world's largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.

With more than 70,000 employees, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?


UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

Job_title: Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Description:
The Position
Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Do you want to support the establishment of a world-class distribution technologies group? In this role you will be providing technical expertise in the development, qualification, implementation and maintenance of global monitoring solutions and thermal shipping systems. In this position, the engineer executes small and medium-sized projects or cold chain related sub-project within bigger project, for clinical and commercial supply chain (from cell banking shipment to Finished Products). You will define goals, develop project execution plans, calculate the business case, ask for endorsement and execute the assigned project.
As Cold Chain Packaging Engineer you work under general supervision with instructions on new assignments. The work is regularly reviewed on soundness of judgement, overall adequacy and accuracy, work priorities and timelines are established with supervision. A key success factor of our function is effective collaboration with supply chain logistics, distribution commercial and clinical quality, clinical supply chain, distribution hubs, internal manufacturing sites, CMOs as well as regulatory affairs.

Job_title: ICT System Engineer (m/w/d) Datacenter und Cloud
Description:
Möchten Sie Ihre Expertise im Datacenter- und Cloudumfeld gezielt in einer neuen beruflichen Herausforderung unter Beweis stellen und dein volles Potential ausschöpfen? Dann lassen Sie uns gemeinsam den nächsten Schritt gehen und Ihre Karriere auf das nächste Level bringen!
Als spezialisierter Personaldienstleister ist TIS-jobs.ch Teil der bruederlinpartner-Gruppe und verbindet jeden Tag Fach- und Führungskräfte im Bereich der Technischen Informatik mit nationalen und internationalen Unternehmen. Profitiere von unserem breiten Netzwerk und finde mit uns deinen Traumjob in einem innovativen und zukunftsorientierten Unternehmen.

Im Auftrag unseres Kunden, der auf intermodale Dienstleistungen für die chemische Industrie spezialisiert ist, suchen wir einen ICT System Engineer (m/w/d) in Vollzeit für den Standort aufgrund des weiteren Wachstums. Zu Ihren Kernaufgaben zählen die Entwicklung von massgeschneiderten ICT-Lösungen in Data Centern, private Cloud und Public Cloud Infrastruktur, die Automatisierung von Prozessen in der ICT-Umgebung sowie die Erstellung von systemtechnischen Beschreibungen, Konzepten und Übersichten.

* Werde Teil unseres Investment Controlling Teams - und damit von einer Abteilung im Wandel. * Unterstütze uns mit deinen konzeptionellen Kenntnissen im Bereich Data Warehousing und Datenmodellierung. * Nutze die Chance, die Veränderungen bei uns aktiv mitgestalten zu können.
Was dich erwartet
Aktuell befinden wir uns im Bereich Asset Management in einer agilen Transformation hin zu noch mehr Selbstorganisation und somit mehr Eigenverantwortung. Neu arbeiten wir in Squads und Chaptern zusammen und nehmen gemeinsam eine End to End Verantwortung wahr. Das ist ein Prozess und er verlangt viel von uns: Geduld, Veränderungswille, Lust am Lernen. Wir gestalten das Neue gemeinsam, nicht allen allerdings fällt das leicht. Aber wir sind überzeugt, dass wir nur mit frischen Ideen und digitalen Ansätzen mehr Fahrt aufnehmen. Hast du Lust, unseren Wandel aktiv mitzugestalten?

Berufserfahrene

Description:
Bei uns in der Informatik der Zürcher Kantonalbank entwickeln wir mit ca. 1'000 Kolleginnen und Kollegen die Technologie von morgen und das im Herzen von Zürich. Wir sind sehr stolz auf unsere "IT made in Chreis 5". Gemeinsam mit dir wollen wir Erfolge feiern und unsere Werte leben: handle mutig, bringe Ideen ein, liefere mit dem Blick aufs Ganze und lebe deine Begeisterung.
Bist du jemand der/die sich für das Thema Business Intelligence & Analytics (BI&A) begeistert, der/die interessiert ist die Plattformen mit Fokus BI&A für heute und für die Zukunft zu entwickeln und zu betreiben.

Dann bist du bei uns im Value Stream Information Management richtig. Denn wir suchen per sofort eine(n) Plattform-Engineer Senior. Nutze mit uns die Chance, persönlich erfolgreich zu sein und mit Leidenschaft den Ausbau unserer Plattformen aktiv mitzugestalten, damit wir morgen erfolgreich bleiben, Daten als wertvolles Gut behandeln und ihr Potenzial noch besser entfalten können.

Description:
Beschreibung
Bei der digitalen Transformation übernimmst du Verantwortung im Management von qualitätsrelevanten Prozess- und Prüfdaten. In einem hoch motivierten und gut vernetzten Team entwickelst du die bestehenden Datenbanken und Dienste weiter. Zudem pflegst du diese permanent und bringst sie technologisch und qualitativ auf Spitzenniveau. Als belastbarer Stakeholder stellst du die Datenqualität im eigenen Bereich sicher, monitorst diese aktiv und leitest bei Bedarf frühzeitig Massnahmen ein. Zusammen mit den internen Stakeholdern aus Produktion, Engineering und Qualität identifizierst du in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen weitere Potenziale für die Datennutzung und setzt diese um.
Motivation
Wenn du dir vorstellen kannst, Teammitglied in einem innovativen und wachstumsstarken Hightech-Unternehmen in einem internationalen Umfeld zu werden, sollten wir uns kennenlernen.

Join Joe Security to Deeply Analyze Cyber Threats
Joe Security LLC is a fast-growing Swiss based company specialized in the development of automated malware analysis systems. We develop and support Joe Sandbox - one of the most advanced malware analysis system for Windows, Linux, Android, iOS and macOS operating systems. Joe Sandbox is actively being used by CERTs, CIRTs, AVs and firewall vendors around the world.
We are looking for a motivated Data Scientist with a high interest in malware analysis. Besides working closely with our team, the main task will be the development of new machine learning models to extract knowledge and insights from our malware analysis corpus.
Job Responsibilities:

The Position
Job mission
The Computational Pathology Scientific Area Lead will drive Pharmaceutical Sciences Pathology computational pathology strategy, and generate insights for our portfolio through the development and execution of computational pathology methods and technologies.
Your impact
You develop, promote and drive strategies for computational toxicologic pathology
You are an expert on computational pathology approaches applied to toxicologic pathology studies

Data Engineer / Analyst

Description:
The Position
At Roche Pharmaceutical Research and Early Development Organization (pRED), we believe that rapid advances in science and technology are our greatest opportunity to rethink how we address some of the world's most challenging unmet health needs and have an even more profound impact on patients and society.
The Roche Institute of Translational Bioengineering (ITB, http://ritb.roche.com) and the Immunology and Ophthalmology (I2O) Discovery Translation Area (DTA) within pRED are looking for an independent and highly motivated Postdoctoral Fellow, Retinal Organoid Bioengineering (m/f/d) to join our team at the interface of basic academic and translational research in the areas of organoid technology, microphysiological systems and age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
The Postdoctoral Fellow will play a key role in ITB's efforts to develop and apply next-generation human models that preserve important functional features of the human eye to be used to develop precision therapies.

Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' tracking data – you ensure our tailor-made IIOT-based systems are implemented to perfection so that they can collect the needed data.

At the heart of our track and trace platform are different IIOT devices and applications, which monitor our customers' assets and send these data further to our server product and customer's business application for analysis.

You will join our Central-European operations team in Switzerland, where we support some of our most long-term key customers and implement our systems to brand new industrial customers. Our office is in Gossau, but you can expect to travel roughly 50% of your time.

As our System Engineer you will be vital in implementing our track & trace solutions. You will mainly specify, test, commission, and support our customer systems.

In this position, you assist in the implementation and development of the manufacturing processes at their new production site.

Your mission
Assist in the development and implementation of various lens manufacturing processes and manufacturing systems to contribute to the production launch of the products in Switzerland
Drive project execution and team member accountability by applying project management skills in international and multi-disciplinary teams
Apply and/or mentor colleagues to statistical and analytical methods such as SPC, R&R Gage and DOE

Job_title: Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Description:
The Position
Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Do you want to support the establishment of a world-class distribution technologies group? In this role you will be providing technical expertise in the development, qualification, implementation and maintenance of global monitoring solutions and thermal shipping systems. In this position, the engineer executes small and medium-sized projects or cold chain related sub-project within bigger project, for clinical and commercial supply chain (from cell banking shipment to Finished Products). You will define goals, develop project execution plans, calculate the business case, ask for endorsement and execute the assigned project.
As Cold Chain Packaging Engineer you work under general supervision with instructions on new assignments. The work is regularly reviewed on soundness of judgement, overall adequacy and accuracy, work priorities and timelines are established with supervision. A key success factor of our function is effective collaboration with supply chain logistics, distribution commercial and clinical quality, clinical supply chain, distribution hubs, internal manufacturing sites, CMOs as well as regulatory affairs.

Description:
EINFÜHRUNG:
As a preferred supplier for Roche Diagnostics Int Ltd in Rotkreuz, we are looking for an individual as
Process / MSAT Engineer
(contract for 1 year duration, with possible extension). The earliest start date is asap. Remote/Homeoffice: possible in consultation.

AUFGABENBESCHREIBUNG:
Deviation- , change- and document management in SAP (process/equipment)
Be a key participant in the manufacturing problem solving process to ensure a fact based and data driven root cause analysis and counter measure identification.

Senior Software Engineer
80 - 100 % per 01.05.2023
DaSCH, the Swiss National Data & Service Centre for the Humanities, is a national research infrastructure and long-term archive (repository) funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation and hosted at the University of Basel. We are responsible for archiving research data coming from research projects from all humanities disciplines like archaeology, history, art history, philosophy and/or history of science. We are a dynamic team with a broad knowledge and working with the most modern technologies. All software created at DaSCH is open source. We actively participate in the open source community. As a Senior Software Engineer you will join a very talented team of individuals who have learned to work well together. You are passionate and self-motivated, with enthusiasm about the complete software development cycle from inception of ideas through execution and delivery, willing to participate in the usual software engineering activities and work closely with other engineers, product management, and the rest of the team. You are open to new ideas and challenges and prefer to work incrementally, with attention to detail and delivery. You champion teamwork and respect majority decisions. We use Scala for the backend of our DaSCH Service Platform, Angular in the frontend, and Python for tooling. We build applications for the web (Desktop and Mobile). Our infrastructure is currently defined in Ansible; we are experimenting with other ways for orchestrating our services and moving towards the cloud. We have an automated test suite, and we are applying continuous integration (CI) and continuous delivery (CD) practices. All our software is open source and on Github (https://github.com/dasch-swiss).

Job_title: ICT System Engineer (m/w/d) Datacenter und Cloud
Description:
Möchten Sie Ihre Expertise im Datacenter- und Cloudumfeld gezielt in einer neuen beruflichen Herausforderung unter Beweis stellen und dein volles Potential ausschöpfen? Dann lassen Sie uns gemeinsam den nächsten Schritt gehen und Ihre Karriere auf das nächste Level bringen!
Als spezialisierter Personaldienstleister ist TIS-jobs.ch Teil der bruederlinpartner-Gruppe und verbindet jeden Tag Fach- und Führungskräfte im Bereich der Technischen Informatik mit nationalen und internationalen Unternehmen. Profitiere von unserem breiten Netzwerk und finde mit uns deinen Traumjob in einem innovativen und zukunftsorientierten Unternehmen.

Im Auftrag unseres Kunden, der auf intermodale Dienstleistungen für die chemische Industrie spezialisiert ist, suchen wir einen ICT System Engineer (m/w/d) in Vollzeit für den Standort aufgrund des weiteren Wachstums. Zu Ihren Kernaufgaben zählen die Entwicklung von massgeschneiderten ICT-Lösungen in Data Centern, private Cloud und Public Cloud Infrastruktur, die Automatisierung von Prozessen in der ICT-Umgebung sowie die Erstellung von systemtechnischen Beschreibungen, Konzepten und Übersichten.

* Werde Teil unseres Investment Controlling Teams - und damit von einer Abteilung im Wandel. * Unterstütze uns mit deinen konzeptionellen Kenntnissen im Bereich Data Warehousing und Datenmodellierung. * Nutze die Chance, die Veränderungen bei uns aktiv mitgestalten zu können.
Was dich erwartet
Aktuell befinden wir uns im Bereich Asset Management in einer agilen Transformation hin zu noch mehr Selbstorganisation und somit mehr Eigenverantwortung. Neu arbeiten wir in Squads und Chaptern zusammen und nehmen gemeinsam eine End to End Verantwortung wahr. Das ist ein Prozess und er verlangt viel von uns: Geduld, Veränderungswille, Lust am Lernen. Wir gestalten das Neue gemeinsam, nicht allen allerdings fällt das leicht. Aber wir sind überzeugt, dass wir nur mit frischen Ideen und digitalen Ansätzen mehr Fahrt aufnehmen. Hast du Lust, unseren Wandel aktiv mitzugestalten?

Description:
Bei uns in der Informatik der Zürcher Kantonalbank entwickeln wir mit ca. 1'000 Kolleginnen und Kollegen die Technologie von morgen und das im Herzen von Zürich. You are an expert on computational pathology approaches applied to toxicologic pathology studies

Description:
Join Joe Security to Deeply Analyze Cyber Threats
Joe Security LLC is a fast-growing Swiss based company specialized in the development of automated malware analysis systems. We develop and support Joe Sandbox - one of the most advanced malware analysis system for Windows, Linux, Android, iOS and macOS operating systems. Joe Sandbox is actively being used by CERTs, CIRTs, AVs and firewall vendors around the world.
We are looking for a motivated Data Scientist with a high interest in malware analysis. Besides working closely with our team, the main task will be the development of new machine learning models to extract knowledge and insights from our malware analysis corpus.
Job Responsibilities:

Data Engineer / Analyst

For our Medical Devices client, we are currently looking for a Data Engineer / Analyst

We are looking for a passionate Data Engineer/Analyst to turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions in close collaboration with our production specialists.
As Data Engineer/Analyst you will provide scientific data support for our client's highly automated production. Your experience, analytical approach, know-how and visualization skills will be crucial for identifying process improvements to ensure a stable manufacturing yield and an outstanding customer experience. You will be part of our data analytics team and will work in a dynamic environment at the pulse of client's digital journey.




Sounds like a great job?
Then we look forward to receiving your complete application documents through our online application form.

Description:
The Position
At Roche Pharmaceutical Research and Early Development Organization (pRED), we believe that rapid advances in science and technology are our greatest opportunity to rethink how we address some of the world's most challenging unmet health needs and have an even more profound impact on patients and society.
The Roche Institute of Translational Bioengineering (ITB, http://ritb.roche.com) and the Immunology and Ophthalmology (I2O) Discovery Translation Area (DTA) within pRED are looking for an independent and highly motivated Postdoctoral Fellow, Retinal Organoid Bioengineering (m/f/d) to join our team at the interface of basic academic and translational research in the areas of organoid technology, microphysiological systems and age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
The Postdoctoral Fellow will play a key role in ITB's efforts to develop and apply next-generation human models that preserve important functional features of the human eye to be used to develop precision therapies.

Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' tracking data – you ensure our tailor-made IIOT-based systems are implemented to perfection so that they can collect the needed data.

At the heart of our track and trace platform are different IIOT devices and applications, which monitor our customers' assets and send these data further to our server product and customer's business application for analysis.

You will join our Central-European operations team in Switzerland, where we support some of our most long-term key customers and implement our systems to brand new industrial customers. Our office is in Gossau, but you can expect to travel roughly 50% of your time.

As our System Engineer you will be vital in implementing our track & trace solutions. You will mainly specify, test, commission, and support our customer systems.

At Julius Baer, we celebrate and value the individual qualities you bring, enabling you to be impactful, to be entrepreneurial, to be empowered, and to create value beyond wealth. Let’s shape the future of wealth management together.
Julius Baer Division Markets is looking for a new Head of the Software Solutions Competence Center. Markets Technology aims to strategically develop, strengthen, and align the software engineering expertise within the Markets division.

Do you want to shape the future? We are looking for an experienced, inspired role model to lead our global Software Development community. As a member of the Markets Technology Management Committee, you will report to the Head Markets Technology with the mission to build and shape the community into a strong and recognized competence center of software development experts within the division.

This senior leadership role enables you to communicate and interact with business owners and IT stakeholders, as well as to define, shape and execute the software development strategy.
The role calls for a foundation of strong software development skills and experience, supported by deep software delivery expertise with agile and DevOps delivery models, allowing you to not only develop your own organization but also influence and drive the required cultural change and optimize the usage of technology for an effective and efficient software delivery.

Job_title: Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Description:
The Position
Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Do you want to support the establishment of a world-class distribution technologies group? In this role you will be providing technical expertise in the development, qualification, implementation and maintenance of global monitoring solutions and thermal shipping systems. In this position, the engineer executes small and medium-sized projects or cold chain related sub-project within bigger project, for clinical and commercial supply chain (from cell banking shipment to Finished Products). You will define goals, develop project execution plans, calculate the business case, ask for endorsement and execute the assigned project.
As Cold Chain Packaging Engineer you work under general supervision with instructions on new assignments. The work is regularly reviewed on soundness of judgement, overall adequacy and accuracy, work priorities and timelines are established with supervision. A key success factor of our function is effective collaboration with supply chain logistics, distribution commercial and clinical quality, clinical supply chain, distribution hubs, internal manufacturing sites, CMOs as well as regulatory affairs.

Description:
Senior Software Engineer
80 - 100 % per 01.05.2023
DaSCH, the Swiss National Data & Service Centre for the Humanities, is a national research infrastructure and long-term archive (repository) funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation and hosted at the University of Basel. We are responsible for archiving research data coming from research projects from all humanities disciplines like archaeology, history, art history, philosophy and/or history of science. We are a dynamic team with a broad knowledge and working with the most modern technologies. All software created at DaSCH is open source. We actively participate in the open source community. As a Senior Software Engineer you will join a very talented team of individuals who have learned to work well together. You are passionate and self-motivated, with enthusiasm about the complete software development cycle from inception of ideas through execution and delivery, willing to participate in the usual software engineering activities and work closely with other engineers, product management, and the rest of the team. You are open to new ideas and challenges and prefer to work incrementally, with attention to detail and delivery. You champion teamwork and respect majority decisions. We use Scala for the backend of our DaSCH Service Platform, Angular in the frontend, and Python for tooling. We build applications for the web (Desktop and Mobile). Our infrastructure is currently defined in Ansible; we are experimenting with other ways for orchestrating our services and moving towards the cloud. We have an automated test suite, and we are applying continuous integration (CI) and continuous delivery (CD) practices. All our software is open source and on Github (https://github.com/dasch-swiss).

Description:
* Werde Teil unseres Investment Controlling Teams - und damit von einer Abteilung im Wandel. * Unterstütze uns mit deinen konzeptionellen Kenntnissen im Bereich Data Warehousing und Datenmodellierung. * Nutze die Chance, die Veränderungen bei uns aktiv mitgestalten zu können.
Was dich erwartet
Aktuell befinden wir uns im Bereich Asset Management in einer agilen Transformation hin zu noch mehr Selbstorganisation und somit mehr Eigenverantwortung. Neu arbeiten wir in Squads und Chaptern zusammen und nehmen gemeinsam eine End to End Verantwortung wahr. Das ist ein Prozess und er verlangt viel von uns: Geduld, Veränderungswille, Lust am Lernen. Wir gestalten das Neue gemeinsam, nicht allen allerdings fällt das leicht. Aber wir sind überzeugt, dass wir nur mit frischen Ideen und digitalen Ansätzen mehr Fahrt aufnehmen. Hast du Lust, unseren Wandel aktiv mitzugestalten?

Description:
Bei uns in der Informatik der Zürcher Kantonalbank entwickeln wir mit ca. 1'000 Kolleginnen und Kollegen die Technologie von morgen und das im Herzen von Zürich. Wir sind sehr stolz auf unsere "IT made in Chreis 5". Gemeinsam mit dir wollen wir Erfolge feiern und unsere Werte leben: handle mutig, bringe Ideen ein, liefere mit dem Blick aufs Ganze und lebe deine Begeisterung.
Bist du jemand der/die sich für das Thema Business Intelligence & Analytics (BI&A) begeistert, der/die interessiert ist die Plattformen mit Fokus BI&A für heute und für die Zukunft zu entwickeln und zu betreiben.

Dann bist du bei uns im Value Stream Information Management richtig. Denn wir suchen per sofort eine(n) Plattform-Engineer Senior. Description:
Beschreibung
Bei der digitalen Transformation übernimmst du Verantwortung im Management von qualitätsrelevanten Prozess- und Prüfdaten. In einem hoch motivierten und gut vernetzten Team entwickelst du die bestehenden Datenbanken und Dienste weiter. Zudem pflegst du diese permanent und bringst sie technologisch und qualitativ auf Spitzenniveau. Als belastbarer Stakeholder stellst du die Datenqualität im eigenen Bereich sicher, monitorst diese aktiv und leitest bei Bedarf frühzeitig Massnahmen ein. Zusammen mit den internen Stakeholdern aus Produktion, Engineering und Qualität identifizierst du in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen weitere Potenziale für die Datennutzung und setzt diese um.
Motivation
Wenn du dir vorstellen kannst, Teammitglied in einem innovativen und wachstumsstarken Hightech-Unternehmen in einem internationalen Umfeld zu werden, sollten wir uns kennenlernen.

Join Joe Security to Deeply Analyze Cyber Threats
Joe Security LLC is a fast-growing Swiss based company specialized in the development of automated malware analysis systems. We develop and support Joe Sandbox - one of the most advanced malware analysis system for Windows, Linux, Android, iOS and macOS operating systems. Joe Sandbox is actively being used by CERTs, CIRTs, AVs and firewall vendors around the world.
We are looking for a motivated Data Scientist with a high interest in malware analysis. Besides working closely with our team, the main task will be the development of new machine learning models to extract knowledge and insights from our malware analysis corpus.
Job Responsibilities:

Data Engineer / Analyst

For our Medical Devices client, we are currently looking for a Data Engineer / Analyst

We are looking for a passionate Data Engineer/Analyst to turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions in close collaboration with our production specialists.
As Data Engineer/Analyst you will provide scientific data support for our client's highly automated production. Your experience, analytical approach, know-how and visualization skills will be crucial for identifying process improvements to ensure a stable manufacturing yield and an outstanding customer experience. You will be part of our data analytics team and will work in a dynamic environment at the pulse of client's digital journey.

Description:
The Position
At Roche Pharmaceutical Research and Early Development Organization (pRED), we believe that rapid advances in science and technology are our greatest opportunity to rethink how we address some of the world's most challenging unmet health needs and have an even more profound impact on patients and society.
The Roche Institute of Translational Bioengineering (ITB, http://ritb.roche.com) and the Immunology and Ophthalmology (I2O) Discovery Translation Area (DTA) within pRED are looking for an independent and highly motivated Postdoctoral Fellow, Retinal Organoid Bioengineering (m/f/d) to join our team at the interface of basic academic and translational research in the areas of organoid technology, microphysiological systems and age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
The Postdoctoral Fellow will play a key role in ITB's efforts to develop and apply next-generation human models that preserve important functional features of the human eye to be used to develop precision therapies.

Description:
EINFÜHRUNG:
As a preferred supplier for Roche Diagnostics Int Ltd in Rotkreuz, we are looking for an individual as
Engineer/Scientist in electrochemical method development
(contract for 12 months, with possible extension). The earliest start date is as soon as possible. Remote/Home Office: possible at times.

AUFGABENBESCHREIBUNG:
Statistical evaluation of analytical performance data, thereby substantiating updated or new product claims
Troubleshooting support for verification studies

What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' tracking data – you ensure our tailor-made IIOT-based systems are implemented to perfection so that they can collect the needed data.

At the heart of our track and trace platform are different IIOT devices and applications, which monitor our customers' assets and send these data further to our server product and customer's business application for analysis.

You will join our Central-European operations team in Switzerland, where we support some of our most long-term key customers and implement our systems to brand new industrial customers. Our office is in Gossau, but you can expect to travel roughly 50% of your time.

As our System Engineer you will be vital in implementing our track & trace solutions. You will mainly specify, test, commission, and support our customer systems.

My client is currently developing a new-generation single-turbine helicopter, delivering high performance and offering the largest cabin in its class.
It is looking for:
Role: Electrical System Engineer
Pay: To be defined on the basis of experience
Location: Zurich - Switzerland
Contract: Permanent Full Time

Description:
Bitplane/Andor produces a world leading software for visualization and analysis of 3D and 4D microscopic images. The product Imaris® enables biologists to visualize large images at interactive frame rates and it provides tools to easily segment data using robust image processing algorithms and to analyze data using interactive classification and statistics tools. Our vision is to provide easy to use image analysis methods that “just work” in the hands of the biologist.
We are seeking a computer scientist, physicist, or mathematician with an interest in writing software to work in our development team in a full-time or 80% position. You will work in a small team programming in C++ to build future versions of our software Imaris®.
You should be interested writing well structured software. You should be interested in finding efficient solutions to, well, more or less anything. You should meet the following requirements:

* Werde Teil unseres Investment Controlling Teams - und damit von einer Abteilung im Wandel. * Unterstütze uns mit deinen konzeptionellen Kenntnissen im Bereich Data Warehousing und Datenmodellierung. * Nutze die Chance, die Veränderungen bei uns aktiv mitgestalten zu können.
Was dich erwartet
Aktuell befinden wir uns im Bereich Asset Management in einer agilen Transformation hin zu noch mehr Selbstorganisation und somit mehr Eigenverantwortung. Neu arbeiten wir in Squads und Chaptern zusammen und nehmen gemeinsam eine End to End Verantwortung wahr. Das ist ein Prozess und er verlangt viel von uns: Geduld, Veränderungswille, Lust am Lernen. Wir gestalten das Neue gemeinsam, nicht allen allerdings fällt das leicht. Aber wir sind überzeugt, dass wir nur mit frischen Ideen und digitalen Ansätzen mehr Fahrt aufnehmen. Hast du Lust, unseren Wandel aktiv mitzugestalten?

Berufserfahrene

Description:
Bei uns in der Informatik der Zürcher Kantonalbank entwickeln wir mit ca. 1'000 Kolleginnen und Kollegen die Technologie von morgen und das im Herzen von Zürich. Wir sind sehr stolz auf unsere "IT made in Chreis 5". Gemeinsam mit dir wollen wir Erfolge feiern und unsere Werte leben: handle mutig, bringe Ideen ein, liefere mit dem Blick aufs Ganze und lebe deine Begeisterung.
Bist du jemand der/die sich für das Thema Business Intelligence & Analytics (BI&A) begeistert, der/die interessiert ist die Plattformen mit Fokus BI&A für heute und für die Zukunft zu entwickeln und zu betreiben.

Dann bist du bei uns im Value Stream Information Management richtig. Denn wir suchen per sofort eine(n) Plattform-Engineer Senior. Nutze mit uns die Chance, persönlich erfolgreich zu sein und mit Leidenschaft den Ausbau unserer Plattformen aktiv mitzugestalten, damit wir morgen erfolgreich bleiben, Daten als wertvolles Gut behandeln und ihr Potenzial noch besser entfalten können.

Description:
Beschreibung
Bei der digitalen Transformation übernimmst du Verantwortung im Management von qualitätsrelevanten Prozess- und Prüfdaten. In einem hoch motivierten und gut vernetzten Team entwickelst du die bestehenden Datenbanken und Dienste weiter. Zudem pflegst du diese permanent und bringst sie technologisch und qualitativ auf Spitzenniveau. Als belastbarer Stakeholder stellst du die Datenqualität im eigenen Bereich sicher, monitorst diese aktiv und leitest bei Bedarf frühzeitig Massnahmen ein. Zusammen mit den internen Stakeholdern aus Produktion, Engineering und Qualität identifizierst du in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen weitere Potenziale für die Datennutzung und setzt diese um.
Motivation
Wenn du dir vorstellen kannst, Teammitglied in einem innovativen und wachstumsstarken Hightech-Unternehmen in einem internationalen Umfeld zu werden, sollten wir uns kennenlernen.

Join Joe Security to Deeply Analyze Cyber Threats
Joe Security LLC is a fast-growing Swiss based company specialized in the development of automated malware analysis systems. We develop and support Joe Sandbox - one of the most advanced malware analysis system for Windows, Linux, Android, iOS and macOS operating systems. Joe Sandbox is actively being used by CERTs, CIRTs, AVs and firewall vendors around the world.
We are looking for a motivated Data Scientist with a high interest in malware analysis. Besides working closely with our team, the main task will be the development of new machine learning models to extract knowledge and insights from our malware analysis corpus.
Job Responsibilities:

The Position
Job mission
The Computational Pathology Scientific Area Lead will drive Pharmaceutical Sciences Pathology computational pathology strategy, and generate insights for our portfolio through the development and execution of computational pathology methods and technologies.
Your impact
You develop, promote and drive strategies for computational toxicologic pathology
You are an expert on computational pathology approaches applied to toxicologic pathology studies

Description:
The Position
At Roche Pharmaceutical Research and Early Development Organization (pRED), we believe that rapid advances in science and technology are our greatest opportunity to rethink how we address some of the world's most challenging unmet health needs and have an even more profound impact on patients and society.
The Roche Institute of Translational Bioengineering (ITB, http://ritb.roche.com) and the Immunology and Ophthalmology (I2O) Discovery Translation Area (DTA) within pRED are looking for an independent and highly motivated Postdoctoral Fellow, Retinal Organoid Bioengineering (m/f/d) to join our team at the interface of basic academic and translational research in the areas of organoid technology, microphysiological systems and age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
The Postdoctoral Fellow will play a key role in ITB's efforts to develop and apply next-generation human models that preserve important functional features of the human eye to be used to develop precision therapies.

Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' tracking data – you ensure our tailor-made IIOT-based systems are implemented to perfection so that they can collect the needed data.

At the heart of our track and trace platform are different IIOT devices and applications, which monitor our customers' assets and send these data further to our server product and customer's business application for analysis.

You will join our Central-European operations team in Switzerland, where we support some of our most long-term key customers and implement our systems to brand new industrial customers. Our office is in Gossau, but you can expect to travel roughly 50% of your time.

As our System Engineer you will be vital in implementing our track & trace solutions. You will mainly specify, test, commission, and support our customer systems.

As a subsidiary of the Morgan Sindall Group, BakerHicks is part of a globally successful company with around 6,000 employees. We concentrate on the planning and implementation of biotechnological, pharmaceutical and chemical projects in the areas of production, research and development. Description:
Bitplane/Andor produces a world leading software for visualization and analysis of 3D and 4D microscopic images. Description:
Beschreibung
Bei der digitalen Transformation übernimmst du Verantwortung im Management von qualitätsrelevanten Prozess- und Prüfdaten. In einem hoch motivierten und gut vernetzten Team entwickelst du die bestehenden Datenbanken und Dienste weiter. Zudem pflegst du diese permanent und bringst sie technologisch und qualitativ auf Spitzenniveau. Als belastbarer Stakeholder stellst du die Datenqualität im eigenen Bereich sicher, monitorst diese aktiv und leitest bei Bedarf frühzeitig Massnahmen ein. Zusammen mit den internen Stakeholdern aus Produktion, Engineering und Qualität identifizierst du in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen weitere Potenziale für die Datennutzung und setzt diese um.
Motivation
Wenn du dir vorstellen kannst, Teammitglied in einem innovativen und wachstumsstarken Hightech-Unternehmen in einem internationalen Umfeld zu werden, sollten wir uns kennenlernen.

Join Joe Security to Deeply Analyze Cyber Threats
Joe Security LLC is a fast-growing Swiss based company specialized in the development of automated malware analysis systems. We develop and support Joe Sandbox - one of the most advanced malware analysis system for Windows, Linux, Android, iOS and macOS operating systems. Joe Sandbox is actively being used by CERTs, CIRTs, AVs and firewall vendors around the world.
We are looking for a motivated Data Scientist with a high interest in malware analysis. Besides working closely with our team, the main task will be the development of new machine learning models to extract knowledge and insights from our malware analysis corpus.
Job Responsibilities:

The Position
Job mission
The Computational Pathology Scientific Area Lead will drive Pharmaceutical Sciences Pathology computational pathology strategy, and generate insights for our portfolio through the development and execution of computational pathology methods and technologies.
Your impact
You develop, promote and drive strategies for computational toxicologic pathology
You are an expert on computational pathology approaches applied to toxicologic pathology studies

Description:
The Position
At Roche Pharmaceutical Research and Early Development Organization (pRED), we believe that rapid advances in science and technology are our greatest opportunity to rethink how we address some of the world's most challenging unmet health needs and have an even more profound impact on patients and society.
The Roche Institute of Translational Bioengineering (ITB, http://ritb.roche.com) and the Immunology and Ophthalmology (I2O) Discovery Translation Area (DTA) within pRED are looking for an independent and highly motivated Postdoctoral Fellow, Retinal Organoid Bioengineering (m/f/d) to join our team at the interface of basic academic and translational research in the areas of organoid technology, microphysiological systems and age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
The Postdoctoral Fellow will play a key role in ITB's efforts to develop and apply next-generation human models that preserve important functional features of the human eye to be used to develop precision therapies.

Description:

Description:
Für unseren Kunden Cotra Autotransport AG suchen wir per sofort: Data- & Integration Engineer (w/m/d).
Job-Zusammenfassung

Du pflegst eine analytische und konzeptionelle Arbeitsmethodik? Du bist eine engagierte Persönlichkeit und möchtest Dich einer neuen beruflichen Herausforderung stellen? Dann aufgepasst!
Cotra Autotransport AG ist ein Transport- und Logistikunternehmen der führenden Automarken in der Schweiz. Mit ihren Dienstleistungen machen sie Mobilität in der Schweiz möglich. Mit 250 Mitarbeitenden und 100 Fahrzeugen sind sie täglich gerne für ihre Kunden im Einsatz. Als Recruiting-Partner der Cotra Autotransport AG suchen wir Dich als zur Verstärkung des Teams in Lupfig. Gemeinsam mit dem Team holst Du relevante Daten rein und bereitest diese auf. Des Weiteren übernimmst Du die Verantwortung der Speicherung, Verwaltung und Sicherung der Daten. Freue Dich auf ein breites Tätigkeitsfeld mit individuellen Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten und einem tollen Arbeitsklima.

Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' tracking data – you ensure our tailor-made IIOT-based systems are implemented to perfection so that they can collect the needed data.

At the heart of our track and trace platform are different IIOT devices and applications, which monitor our customers' assets and send these data further to our server product and customer's business application for analysis.

You will join our Central-European operations team in Switzerland, where we support some of our most long-term key customers and implement our systems to brand new industrial customers. Our office is in Gossau, but you can expect to travel roughly 50% of your time.

As our System Engineer you will be vital in implementing our track & trace solutions. You will mainly specify, test, commission, and support our customer systems.

At Julius Baer, we celebrate and value the individual qualities you bring, enabling you to be impactful, to be entrepreneurial, to be empowered, and to create value beyond wealth. Let’s shape the future of wealth management together.
Julius Baer Division Markets is looking for a new Head of the Software Solutions Competence Center. Markets Technology aims to strategically develop, strengthen, and align the software engineering expertise within the Markets division.

Do you want to shape the future? We are looking for an experienced, inspired role model to lead our global Software Development community. As a member of the Markets Technology Management Committee, you will report to the Head Markets Technology with the mission to build and shape the community into a strong and recognized competence center of software development experts within the division.

This senior leadership role enables you to communicate and interact with business owners and IT stakeholders, as well as to define, shape and execute the software development strategy.
The role calls for a foundation of strong software development skills and experience, supported by deep software delivery expertise with agile and DevOps delivery models, allowing you to not only develop your own organization but also influence and drive the required cultural change and optimize the usage of technology for an effective and efficient software delivery.

Description:
Bitplane/Andor produces a world leading software for visualization and analysis of 3D and 4D microscopic images. The product Imaris® enables biologists to visualize large images at interactive frame rates and it provides tools to easily segment data using robust image processing algorithms and to analyze data using interactive classification and statistics tools. Our vision is to provide easy to use image analysis methods that “just work” in the hands of the biologist.
We are seeking a computer scientist, physicist, or mathematician with an interest in writing software to work in our development team in a full-time or 80% position. You will work in a small team programming in C++ to build future versions of our software Imaris®.
You should be interested writing well structured software. You should be interested in finding efficient solutions to, well, more or less anything. You should meet the following requirements:

Senior Quality Engineer

We are seeking a highly motivated Senior Quality Engineer with experience in the medical device industry. The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements, standards, and guidelines, as well as providing guidance and leadership to the quality team.

Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain quality system procedures to ensure compliance with regulations and standards (e.g. ISO 13485, FDA QSR)
Lead and participate in internal and external audits, ensuring that findings are appropriately addressed and documented

Job_title: Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Description:
The Position
Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Do you want to support the establishment of a world-class distribution technologies group? In this role you will be providing technical expertise in the development, qualification, implementation and maintenance of global monitoring solutions and thermal shipping systems. In this position, the engineer executes small and medium-sized projects or cold chain related sub-project within bigger project, for clinical and commercial supply chain (from cell banking shipment to Finished Products). You will define goals, develop project execution plans, calculate the business case, ask for endorsement and execute the assigned project.
As Cold Chain Packaging Engineer you work under general supervision with instructions on new assignments. The work is regularly reviewed on soundness of judgement, overall adequacy and accuracy, work priorities and timelines are established with supervision. A key success factor of our function is effective collaboration with supply chain logistics, distribution commercial and clinical quality, clinical supply chain, distribution hubs, internal manufacturing sites, CMOs as well as regulatory affairs.

Description:
* Werde Teil unseres Investment Controlling Teams - und damit von einer Abteilung im Wandel. * Unterstütze uns mit deinen konzeptionellen Kenntnissen im Bereich Data Warehousing und Datenmodellierung. * Nutze die Chance, die Veränderungen bei uns aktiv mitgestalten zu können.
Was dich erwartet
Aktuell befinden wir uns im Bereich Asset Management in einer agilen Transformation hin zu noch mehr Selbstorganisation und somit mehr Eigenverantwortung. Neu arbeiten wir in Squads und Chaptern zusammen und nehmen gemeinsam eine End to End Verantwortung wahr. Das ist ein Prozess und er verlangt viel von uns: Geduld, Veränderungswille, Lust am Lernen. Wir gestalten das Neue gemeinsam, nicht allen allerdings fällt das leicht. Aber wir sind überzeugt, dass wir nur mit frischen Ideen und digitalen Ansätzen mehr Fahrt aufnehmen. Hast du Lust, unseren Wandel aktiv mitzugestalten?

Bei der digitalen Transformation übernimmst du Verantwortung im Management von qualitätsrelevanten Prozess- und Prüfdaten. Description:
Join Joe Security to Deeply Analyze Cyber Threats
Joe Security LLC is a fast-growing Swiss based company specialized in the development of automated malware analysis systems. We develop and support Joe Sandbox - one of the most advanced malware analysis system for Windows, Linux, Android, iOS and macOS operating systems. Joe Sandbox is actively being used by CERTs, CIRTs, AVs and firewall vendors around the world.
We are looking for a motivated Data Scientist with a high interest in malware analysis. Besides working closely with our team, the main task will be the development of new machine learning models to extract knowledge and insights from our malware analysis corpus.
Job Responsibilities:

Bei uns in der Informatik der Zürcher Kantonalbank entwickeln wir mit ca. 1'000 Kolleginnen und Kollegen die Technologie von morgen und das im Herzen von Zürich. Wir sind sehr stolz auf unsere "IT made in Chreis 5". Gemeinsam mit dir wollen wir Erfolge feiern und unsere Werte leben: handle mutig, bringe Ideen ein, liefere mit dem Blick aufs Ganze und lebe deine Begeisterung.
Bist du jemand der/die sich für das Thema Business Intelligence & Analytics (BI&A) begeistert, der/die interessiert ist die Plattformen mit Fokus BI&A für heute und für die Zukunft zu entwickeln und zu betreiben.

Dann bist du bei uns im Value Stream Information Management richtig. Denn wir suchen per sofort eine(n) Plattform-Engineer Senior. Nutze mit uns die Chance, persönlich erfolgreich zu sein und mit Leidenschaft den Ausbau unserer Plattformen aktiv mitzugestalten, damit wir morgen erfolgreich bleiben, Daten als wertvolles Gut behandeln und ihr Potenzial noch besser entfalten können.

Description:
The Position
At Roche Pharmaceutical Research and Early Development Organization (pRED), we believe that rapid advances in science and technology are our greatest opportunity to rethink how we address some of the world's most challenging unmet health needs and have an even more profound impact on patients and society.
The Roche Institute of Translational Bioengineering (ITB, http://ritb.roche.com) and the Immunology and Ophthalmology (I2O) Discovery Translation Area (DTA) within pRED are looking for an independent and highly motivated Postdoctoral Fellow, Retinal Organoid Bioengineering (m/f/d) to join our team at the interface of basic academic and translational research in the areas of organoid technology, microphysiological systems and age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
The Postdoctoral Fellow will play a key role in ITB's efforts to develop and apply next-generation human models that preserve important functional features of the human eye to be used to develop precision therapies.

Job_title: Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Description:
The Position
Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months
Do you want to support the establishment of a world-class distribution technologies group? In this role you will be providing technical expertise in the development, qualification, implementation and maintenance of global monitoring solutions and thermal shipping systems. In this position, the engineer executes small and medium-sized projects or cold chain related sub-project within bigger project, for clinical and commercial supply chain (from cell banking shipment to Finished Products). You will define goals, develop project execution plans, calculate the business case, ask for endorsement and execute the assigned project.
As Cold Chain Packaging Engineer you work under general supervision with instructions on new assignments. The work is regularly reviewed on soundness of judgement, overall adequacy and accuracy, work priorities and timelines are established with supervision. A key success factor of our function is effective collaboration with supply chain logistics, distribution commercial and clinical quality, clinical supply chain, distribution hubs, internal manufacturing sites, CMOs as well as regulatory affairs.

Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' tracking data – you ensure our tailor-made IIOT-based systems are implemented to perfection so that they can collect the needed data.

At the heart of our track and trace platform are different IIOT devices and applications, which monitor our customers' assets and send these data further to our server product and customer's business application for analysis.

You will join our Central-European operations team in Switzerland, where we support some of our most long-term key customers and implement our systems to brand new industrial customers. Our office is in Gossau, but you can expect to travel roughly 50% of your time.

As our System Engineer you will be vital in implementing our track & trace solutions. You will mainly specify, test, commission, and support our customer systems.

As a subsidiary of the Morgan Sindall Group, BakerHicks is part of a globally successful company with around 6,000 employees. We concentrate on the planning and implementation of biotechnological, pharmaceutical and chemical projects in the areas of production, research and development. With our integrated range of services and strong customer focus, BakerHicks has achieved a leading market position in the DACH region and beyond.
Data Management Engineer (m/f)
SWITZERLAND – LAUSANNE
Basel

Job_title: Graduate Talent Program 2023, UBS RiskLab Data Science Model Services
Description:
Your role
Are you an enthusiastic computer science graduate looking to jump start your career in IT and data science? Do you have excellent problem-solving skills to solve advanced IT problems for our market leading data science model development platform? If so, you are the right person for this role. We're seeking graduate talents to join our development team within UBS Risk IT Model Services. We're looking for someone like that to:
work on the IT implementation of the new Cloud based data science model development platform for UBS Global Risk methodology team
develop in house web based application that automate the data science model development to production lifecycle
contribute to DevOps processes and setup the optimal data science development environments, containers, library dependencies, IDEs and execution pipelines.


Our Graduate Talent Program (GTP) lasts 18 months. You'll be directly involved in day-to-day operations, working with professionals and gaining first-hand experience of our business.

As well as on-the-job learning, you'll get training on the financial markets, our products and other core business topics. Rotational assignments are a key part of the program. By taking on other roles in related departments, you'll gain a wider perspective.

Besides all that, you'll attend networking events, cross-business classes and social occasions where you'll get to know us.

To learn more about our Graduate Talent Programs, click here .
You will be part of the UBS Risk IT, RiskLab and Model Services team.

The RiskLab Model Service team is a group of advanced and pioneering software engineers and data science professionals who brings modern computer science and data science technology and IT platform to our methodology data scientists.

We implement common reusable IT solutions to ensure the data science model development and execution runs on most optimal and scalable framework. We research emerging data science technology and draw up adaptation plan for our methodology audience, and setup regular training sessions or pilot model development to ensure the UBS Risk methodology remains competitive and ahead of our peers.


You need have completed your bachelor's or master's degree.

In particular, you have:

Perhaps you've organized a fundraising event or taken part in team sports? Or persevered and passed an exam in a subject you found challenging? Think about how things you've achieved match the skills we're after.

Start date: September 2023


At UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.

From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we're more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?


UBS is the world's largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.

With more than 70,000 employees, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?


UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

Description:
* Werde Teil unseres Investment Controlling Teams - und damit von einer Abteilung im Wandel. * Unterstütze uns mit deinen konzeptionellen Kenntnissen im Bereich Data Warehousing und Datenmodellierung. * Nutze die Chance, die Veränderungen bei uns aktiv mitgestalten zu können.
Was dich erwartet
Aktuell befinden wir uns im Bereich Asset Management in einer agilen Transformation hin zu noch mehr Selbstorganisation und somit mehr Eigenverantwortung. Neu arbeiten wir in Squads und Chaptern zusammen und nehmen gemeinsam eine End to End Verantwortung wahr. Das ist ein Prozess und er verlangt viel von uns: Geduld, Veränderungswille, Lust am Lernen. Wir gestalten das Neue gemeinsam, nicht allen allerdings fällt das leicht. Aber wir sind überzeugt, dass wir nur mit frischen Ideen und digitalen Ansätzen mehr Fahrt aufnehmen. Hast du Lust, unseren Wandel aktiv mitzugestalten?

Description:
Bei uns in der Informatik der Zürcher Kantonalbank entwickeln wir mit ca. 1'000 Kolleginnen und Kollegen die Technologie von morgen und das im Herzen von Zürich. Wir sind sehr stolz auf unsere "IT made in Chreis 5". Gemeinsam mit dir wollen wir Erfolge feiern und unsere Werte leben: handle mutig, bringe Ideen ein, liefere mit dem Blick aufs Ganze und lebe deine Begeisterung.
Bist du jemand der/die sich für das Thema Business Intelligence & Analytics (BI&A) begeistert, der/die interessiert ist die Plattformen mit Fokus BI&A für heute und für die Zukunft zu entwickeln und zu betreiben.

Dann bist du bei uns im Value Stream Information Management richtig. Denn wir suchen per sofort eine(n) Plattform-Engineer Senior. Nutze mit uns die Chance, persönlich erfolgreich zu sein und mit Leidenschaft den Ausbau unserer Plattformen aktiv mitzugestalten, damit wir morgen erfolgreich bleiben, Daten als wertvolles Gut behandeln und ihr Potenzial noch besser entfalten können.

Description:
Beschreibung
Bei der digitalen Transformation übernimmst du Verantwortung im Management von qualitätsrelevanten Prozess- und Prüfdaten. In einem hoch motivierten und gut vernetzten Team entwickelst du die bestehenden Datenbanken und Dienste weiter. Zudem pflegst du diese permanent und bringst sie technologisch und qualitativ auf Spitzenniveau. Als belastbarer Stakeholder stellst du die Datenqualität im eigenen Bereich sicher, monitorst diese aktiv und leitest bei Bedarf frühzeitig Massnahmen ein. Zusammen mit den internen Stakeholdern aus Produktion, Engineering und Qualität identifizierst du in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen weitere Potenziale für die Datennutzung und setzt diese um.
Motivation
Wenn du dir vorstellen kannst, Teammitglied in einem innovativen und wachstumsstarken Hightech-Unternehmen in einem internationalen Umfeld zu werden, sollten wir uns kennenlernen.

Description:
The Position
At Roche Pharmaceutical Research and Early Development Organization (pRED), we believe that rapid advances in science and technology are our greatest opportunity to rethink how we address some of the world's most challenging unmet health needs and have an even more profound impact on patients and society.
The Roche Institute of Translational Bioengineering (ITB, http://ritb.roche.com) and the Immunology and Ophthalmology (I2O) Discovery Translation Area (DTA) within pRED are looking for an independent and highly motivated Postdoctoral Fellow, Retinal Organoid Bioengineering (m/f/d) to join our team at the interface of basic academic and translational research in the areas of organoid technology, microphysiological systems and age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
The Postdoctoral Fellow will play a key role in ITB's efforts to develop and apply next-generation human models that preserve important functional features of the human eye to be used to develop precision therapies.

Description:
The Position
Cold Chain Packaging Engineer - temporary for 12 months

As Cold Chain Packaging Engineer you work under general supervision with instructions on new assignments. A key success factor of our function is effective collaboration with supply chain logistics, distribution commercial and clinical quality, clinical supply chain, distribution hubs, internal manufacturing sites, CMOs as well as regulatory affairs.

Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' tracking data – you ensure our tailor-made IIOT-based systems are implemented to perfection so that they can collect the needed data.

At the heart of our track and trace platform are different IIOT devices and applications, which monitor our customers' assets and send these data further to our server product and customer's business application for analysis.

You will join our Central-European operations team in Switzerland, where we support some of our most long-term key customers and implement our systems to brand new industrial customers. Our office is in Gossau, but you can expect to travel roughly 50% of your time.

As our System Engineer you will be vital in implementing our track & trace solutions. You will mainly specify, test, commission, and support our customer systems.

On behalf of GEOINFO IT AG, we are searching for their next System Engineer .

Job_title: Graduate Talent Program 2023, UBS RiskLab Data Science Model Services
Description:
Your role
Are you an enthusiastic computer science graduate looking to jump start your career in IT and data science? Do you have excellent problem-solving skills to solve advanced IT problems for our market leading data science model development platform? If so, you are the right person for this role. We're seeking graduate talents to join our development team within UBS Risk IT Model Services. We're looking for someone like that to:
work on the IT implementation of the new Cloud based data science model development platform for UBS Global Risk methodology team
develop in house web based application that automate the data science model development to production lifecycle
contribute to DevOps processes and setup the optimal data science development environments, containers, library dependencies, IDEs and execution pipelines.


Our Graduate Talent Program (GTP) lasts 18 months. You'll be directly involved in day-to-day operations, working with professionals and gaining first-hand experience of our business.

As well as on-the-job learning, you'll get training on the financial markets, our products and other core business topics. Rotational assignments are a key part of the program. By taking on other roles in related departments, you'll gain a wider perspective.

Besides all that, you'll attend networking events, cross-business classes and social occasions where you'll get to know us.

To learn more about our Graduate Talent Programs, click here .
You will be part of the UBS Risk IT, RiskLab and Model Services team.

The RiskLab Model Service team is a group of advanced and pioneering software engineers and data science professionals who brings modern computer science and data science technology and IT platform to our methodology data scientists.

We implement common reusable IT solutions to ensure the data science model development and execution runs on most optimal and scalable framework. We research emerging data science technology and draw up adaptation plan for our methodology audience, and setup regular training sessions or pilot model development to ensure the UBS Risk methodology remains competitive and ahead of our peers.


You need have completed your bachelor's or master's degree.

In particular, you have:

Perhaps you've organized a fundraising event or taken part in team sports? Or persevered and passed an exam in a subject you found challenging? Think about how things you've achieved match the skills we're after.

Start date: September 2023


At UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.

From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we're more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?


UBS is the world's largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.

With more than 70,000 employees, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?


UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

Description:
Bei uns in der Informatik der Zürcher Kantonalbank entwickeln wir mit ca. 1'000 Kolleginnen und Kollegen die Technologie von morgen und das im Herzen von Zürich. Wir sind sehr stolz auf unsere "IT made in Chreis 5". Gemeinsam mit dir wollen wir Erfolge feiern und unsere Werte leben: handle mutig, bringe Ideen ein, liefere mit dem Blick aufs Ganze und lebe deine Begeisterung.
Bist du jemand der/die sich für das Thema Business Intelligence & Analytics (BI&A) begeistert, der/die interessiert ist die Plattformen mit Fokus BI&A für heute und für die Zukunft zu entwickeln und zu betreiben.

Dann bist du bei uns im Value Stream Information Management richtig. Denn wir suchen per sofort eine(n) Plattform-Engineer Senior. Nutze mit uns die Chance, persönlich erfolgreich zu sein und mit Leidenschaft den Ausbau unserer Plattformen aktiv mitzugestalten, damit wir morgen erfolgreich bleiben, Daten als wertvolles Gut behandeln und ihr Potenzial noch besser entfalten können.

Description:
Beschreibung
Bei der digitalen Transformation übernimmst du Verantwortung im Management von qualitätsrelevanten Prozess- und Prüfdaten. In einem hoch motivierten und gut vernetzten Team entwickelst du die bestehenden Datenbanken und Dienste weiter. Zudem pflegst du diese permanent und bringst sie technologisch und qualitativ auf Spitzenniveau. Als belastbarer Stakeholder stellst du die Datenqualität im eigenen Bereich sicher, monitorst diese aktiv und leitest bei Bedarf frühzeitig Massnahmen ein. Zusammen mit den internen Stakeholdern aus Produktion, Engineering und Qualität identifizierst du in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Fachbereichen weitere Potenziale für die Datennutzung und setzt diese um.
Motivation
Wenn du dir vorstellen kannst, Teammitglied in einem innovativen und wachstumsstarken Hightech-Unternehmen in einem internationalen Umfeld zu werden, sollten wir uns kennenlernen.

The Position
Job mission
The Computational Pathology Scientific Area Lead will drive Pharmaceutical Sciences Pathology computational pathology strategy, and generate insights for our portfolio through the development and execution of computational pathology methods and technologies.
Your impact
You develop, promote and drive strategies for computational toxicologic pathology
You are an expert on computational pathology approaches applied to toxicologic pathology studies

Description:
Join Joe Security to Deeply Analyze Cyber Threats
Joe Security LLC is a fast-growing Swiss based company specialized in the development of automated malware analysis systems. We develop and support Joe Sandbox - one of the most advanced malware analysis system for Windows, Linux, Android, iOS and macOS operating systems. Joe Sandbox is actively being used by CERTs, CIRTs, AVs and firewall vendors around the world.
We are looking for a motivated Data Scientist with a high interest in malware analysis. Besides working closely with our team, the main task will be the development of new machine learning models to extract knowledge and insights from our malware analysis corpus.
Job Responsibilities:

Data Engineer / Analyst

For our Medical Devices client, we are currently looking for a Data Engineer / Analyst

We are looking for a passionate Data Engineer/Analyst to turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions in close collaboration with our production specialists.
As Data Engineer/Analyst you will provide scientific data support for our client's highly automated production. Your experience, analytical approach, know-how and visualization skills will be crucial for identifying process improvements to ensure a stable manufacturing yield and an outstanding customer experience. You will be part of our data analytics team and will work in a dynamic environment at the pulse of client's digital journey.




Sounds like a great job?
Then we look forward to receiving your complete application documents through our online application form.
